# GRAPHICS::HAS_SCALEFORM_MOVIE_LOADED

## Summary
Returns true or false on whether the movie has fully loaded or not

## Parameters
* **SCALEFORM_INDEX** scaleformMovieId: Filename of the gfx file we are checking for

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
to check if a movie has streamed in yet
